docs.abstract: Paid paternity leave offers broad benefits, but it won’t become common until prominent men use it and don’t pay a penalty for doing so.
docs.snippet: Paid paternity leave offers broad benefits, but it won’t become common until prominent men use it and don’t pay a penalty for doing so.
docs.lead_paragraph: This week, two companies joined in an unfolding race to provide ever more generous paid parental leave. Netflix said it planned to offer unlimited leave in the first year after a child’s arrival to many (though not all) of its employees, while Microsoft said it would substantially increase the paid leave that it will provide.

headline.main: Bringing Paternity Leave Into the Mainstream
headline.print_headline: Paid Leave for Fathers. Any Takers?

docs.abstract: Microsoft is offering $1 million in prize money to competitive gamers, a crucial leg in the multimillion-dollar marketing push for the video game.
docs.snippet: Microsoft is offering $1 million in prize money to competitive gamers, a crucial leg in the multimillion-dollar marketing push for the video game.
docs.lead_paragraph: KIRKLAND, Wash. — A team of hundreds here was recently putting the final touches on a video game expected to be one of the biggest sellers of the holiday season.

headline.main: With Halo 5: Guardians, Microsoft Seeks to Lure E-Sports Players Back

docs.abstract: Jerome Kohlberg Jr. Dies at Age 90 | Chief of Bankrupt Bitcoin Exchange Arrested | Microsoft’s Uber Investment
docs.snippet: Jerome Kohlberg Jr. Dies at Age 90 | Chief of Bankrupt Bitcoin Exchange Arrested | Microsoft’s Uber Investment
docs.lead_paragraph: HEALTH CARE DEALS RAISE DOUBTS FOR CONSUMERS | The recent frenzy of mergers among health insurers promised big savings, but not everyone is convinced that consumers will see that, Reed Abelson reports in The New York Times. The tie-up between Anthem and Cigna and the deal for Aetna to join its smaller rival Humana would create two behemoths. Along with UnitedHealthGroup, they would control nearly half of the American commercial health insurance market.

headline.main: Morning Agenda: Health Care Deals Raise Doubts for Consumers
